name: Zenguins (BWGJ)
description:
This is my submission for the Black and White Game Jam #8. The theme of the jam was loop, which I used in the daylight cycle and the way levels have to be repeatedly traversed after using other lives to be completed

The game is structured so you should be able to get the mechanics just by playing, however I'm bad at level design so I'll explain anyway.

Whenever the time changes to night, you will turn into a Zenglin. These can't hurt the player, however they can be stomped to be killed or used as platforms. Once you become a zenglin, you will take control of a new penguin and can retravel the level to hopefully make it to the goal. You also become a zenglin whenever you die.

I wanted this to be longer but I didn't notice the jam had started until like 5 days ago so I had to move kinda fast lol
